_sText:
A rendition of the iceworld FY map, except a little bigger! guns and spawn points are almost the same both teams also have buy zones.

This is more of a test to try new texture effects and see what limits could be pushed and not!

What came out of this test:

The level has great FPS considering it's wall-to-wall displacements, even for my crappy machine!
got to create and work with selflit textures
got to create and work with texture blending
got to see what options for translucency and alfa transparency can be used with blending

the complete texture pack can be found as IcePac 1 on fpsbanana.com here
http://www.fpsbanana.com/textures/765
it's not needed to run the map since they are packed in the bsp file, this is here for those who would like to use the textures in there own maps!


if this would be better with out buy zones or if there are any other suggestions let me know!



GrayTap
Sin City: Source Dev. Studio
